description: Palindromes that are the sum of consecutive initial odd primes.
mathematica: palQ[n_]:=Module[{idn=IntegerDigits[n]},idn==Reverse[idn]]; Select[ Accumulate[ Prime[Range[2,25000000]]],palQ] (* The program takes a long time to run and only generates the first 11 terms of the sequence *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Aug 24 2014 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Dec 15 2000.
